name: Dungeon Craft
description:
Dungeon Craft

Enter the realms of Dungeon Craft and roam the vast lands of Fevyrat... as a defensless Healer!

You are the main healer of Tristans guild "Defenders of Fevyrat", and it is your job to keep them alive, while they fight against the evil that walks the earth.

Use powerful spells and all your skills to protect your allies from being crushed, stabbed, burnt or any other very gruesome way to die in a fantasy world.

Learn new ways of spell weaving to increase you abilities and make sure that your allied heroes visit their teachers regularly.

Development

The game is a hobby project of mine and currently under development.

If you enjoy the game feel free to contact me via e-mail, leave a comment or donate. :)
